channel.title: Hollow Knight Game Review
channel.description: A comprehensive review of Team Cherry's Hollow Knight, including gameplay elements, equipment, and DLC content

item.title: Main Character Art
item.description: Artistic representation of the Knight, the main character of Hollow Knight, showcasing its distinctive black body and white mask.

item.title: DLC Content
item.description: Overview of Hollow Knight's free DLC content including Hidden Dreams, The Grimm Troupe, Lifeblood, and Godmaster.

item.title: Charm System
item.description: Complete collection of charms available in the game, showing the intricate charm system used for character builds.

item.title: Equipment Interface
item.description: Game interface showing various equipment and abilities the Knight can acquire throughout the journey.

item.title: World Map
item.description: Detailed map of Hallownest showing various regions including Dirtmouth, City of Tears, and other major areas.

item.title: Game Trailer
item.description: Official trailer showcasing the atmospheric world and gameplay mechanics of Hollow Knight.

item.title: Gameplay Screenshot 1
item.description: Screenshot showing the Knight meeting another character in a dimly lit cavern.

item.title: Gameplay Screenshot 2
item.description: Close-up shot of the Knight with dramatic lighting effects.
